bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of diseases brought forth by pathological qi stagnating and collecting inside the human body. Yi xue zheng chuan 醫學正傳 1: 傷寒大法有四：曰傳經，曰專經，曰即病，曰鬱 病 , “The overall pattern of harm caused by cold is distinguished into four [categories]: transmission through conduits, affecting one particular conduit only, immediate disease, and pent-up [qi] disease ”.
